main event: A witness observed a bright white spherical object traveling at high speed in Grand Rapids, Michigan on April 27, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a ping pong ball and traveled a pronounced rounded path,The observation lasted for 16-18 seconds,It covered 5/8 of the sky during its flight,The report mentions it was identified as possibly a weather balloon based on its characteristics,There was no evidence of electronic observation during the sighting.
